titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2684) making appropriations for the Departments of Veterans Affairs and Housing and Urban Development, and for sundry independent agencies, boards, commissions, corporations, and offices for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2000, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-292, by Ms. Pryce (OH).

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2684 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be read by section. Bill is open to amendments. Provides that before consideration of any other amendment it shall be in order to consider the amendment printed in the rules committee report.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 102.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 275.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 217 - 208 (Roll no. 388).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 8/5/1999--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (open) for the consideration of H.R. 2684 (Departments of Veterans Affairs and of Housing and Urban Development and independent agencies appropriations).
